law.catch_line: Delivery of return and remittance of tax.
law.text: The person required to file the return shall deliver the return together with a remittance of the amount of the tax due to the department.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 431, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 5, Art. I, sec. 54, effective February 5, 1960.
